original_query: SELECT MIN(ph.Id) FROM postHistory as ph, votes as v, users as u, badges as b WHERE u.Id = b.UserId AND u.Id = ph.UserId AND u.Id = v.UserId AND u.Views>=0
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E4 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E1.UserId=E4.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.Views >= 0
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E4E3 AS SELECT * FROM E1E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1E4.UserId=E3.Id)
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E4E3E2 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E4E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1E4E3.UserId=E2.UserId)
